Shooting: 22700 Eastex Fwy. Victim shot in the leg, transported to area hospital. #hounews CC8
HPD Chief @artacevedo briefs media on fatal shooting on Glen Ave. near Mount St. #hounews

HPD commanders, investigators & PIO en route to a shooting incident in the 1000 block of Calvin that occurred about 12:45 p.m. Preliminary information is one person is dead, three others taken by ambulance or private auto to area hospitals. No other info. #hounews

Chief @ArtAcevedo joins hundreds of students at the @Hispanic_Forum 34th Career & Education Day. The goal is to improve Hispanic achievement in the greater Houston area. Today, kids can meet college representatives get help in their college/career search. #RelationalPolicing
Chief @artacevedo addresses HPD_Explorers before their in house competition

The road to recovery was paved with 38 surgeries to date. “My goal is to get back to the streets to serve the community.” Thank you for all the wonderful support! #WelcomeBack, Officer Daily ! 2/2 Pictured: Officer A. Reid, Officer J. Daily, Officer M. Daily

“It feels great to be back!” On Christmas Eve 2018, Officer J. Daily and his partner, Officer A. Reid, were seriously injured when their patrol car was struck by another vehicle and caught on fire. He has returned to work assigned to administrative duties. 1/2
Texans love pick up trucks, but so do the bad guys! Protect your property! Don't leave keys in your vehicle & lock your doors! #LockYourCar #TakeYourKeys
UPDATE: Booking photo of the driver, Carlos Lopez-Obispo, 57, who is now in jail and charged with intoxication manslaughter. #hounews https://twitter.com/houstonpolice/status/1225622458771943424
Here's your chance to name one of our horses! Leave your suggestion on Council Member @AmyPeck's post.
Vehicle Pursuit Concluded: Spencer Hwy @Canada. HPD assistance to Pasadena PD. Suspect crashed and taken into custody. #hounews #houtraffic CC8

South Gessner and VCD officers are at a fatal accident 5800 Bellaire. Adult male riding a mobility scooter was struck by a vehicle and deceased at the hospital. Driver of the vehicle is being investigated for signs of intoxication. 202

Traffic Alert: On the city's east side, HPD has closed the section of N. 80th & Harrisburg to Broadway & Manchester while @HoustonFire & Public Works crews clean up diesel fuel leaked from an 18-wheeler. This area will likely remain closed for 3-4 hours. #houtraffic #hounews
Since the original family disturbance call occurred in the Fort Bend County limits of Houston, the charges are filed in that county. Photo courtesy of @FBCSO.

UPDATE: Booking photo of the suspect who led our officers on a lengthy pursuit that ended in downtown Houston during rush hour on Tues. The suspect, Roy Emanuel Hooks, 59, is now charged with felony evading in a motor vehicle & terroristic threat of family members. #hounews
#RelationalPolicing
Shooting Investigation: 3700 Rawley. Preliminary info is a victim was shot in the back. Victim has been transported to the hospital. #hounews CC6
Major PD Crash: Katy Fwy HOV lane (o/b) @Chimney Rock. Officer ok, minor injury. #hounews #houtraffic. CC8
Shooting-Homicide: 9700 Lockwood. Victim robbed and shot. Preliminary info victim is deceased. #hounews CC8

Our Homicide investigators are en route to 9601 West Montgomery after a deceased person was found about 3:55 p.m by @HoustonFire following an apartment fire at that address. No other information available at this time. #hounews
Media Briefing on @TxDPSSoutheast Shooting Incident at 10650 Northwest Freeway

HPD Major Assaults investigators are responding to a scene in the 800 block of E. 24th St. near North Main Street. Preliminary information is an auto theft suspect crashed a stolen vehicle and was then struck by another vehicle as he fled on foot. #hounews
Since this occurred in the city limits of Houston, HPD commanders and PIO will also be en route to the scene. #hounews
North and Auto Theft officers just apprehended 3 theft suspects 5600 Airline. 202

3000 Tidewater: Suspect in custody. #hounews #houtraffic CC8
Barricaded Suspect: 3000 Tidewater. Suspect in stolen vehicle taken in robbery - refusing to come out. #hounews #houtraffic CC8
Shooting: 8900 S. Braeswood. Drive by. Male shot in side/abdomen. Transported to area hospital. #hounews CC8
North Belt officers and CST just apprehended 6 robbery suspect from a robbery in Montgomery County. Assist by Montgomery SO, Montgomery Pct. 3 Constable, Harris County SO, Harris Co Pct 1 and 4.
Executive Asst Chief @TroyFinner Media Briefing on Arrest of Vehicle Pursuit Suspect
At 5:30 pm, we will have a media briefing here at the scene on Rusk at San Jacinto.
HPD commanders and PIO are en route to San Jacinto at Rusk in downtown Houston after a suspect who led our officers on a lengthy vehicle pursuit was taken into custody a short time ago. #hounews
UPDATE: A short time ago, officers spotted the vehicle and stopped it at San Jacinto at Rusk. The suspect driver is now in custody. #hounews #houtraffic
Chief @ArtAcevedo participates in a podcast discussion involving various topics regarding public safety on @DeepDivePod this month. #Hounews

The pursuit reached the downtown Houston area and was discontinued a short time ago. Officers have been advised of the suspect's identity and will continue the investigation into his actions. #hounews #houtraffic

#HPDintheAir One of our helicopters is assisting patrol officers in a vehicle pursuit that began about 3:30 pm. and is now NB on Gulf Fwy near Griggs. Prelim info is male suspect, possible armed, is driving a black Nissan truck. Please avoid the area. #hounews #houtraffic
HPD Commanders, Other Agencies Procession of Fallen Liberty County Deputy Richard Whitten #HouNews
UPDATE: Procession to escort fallen Deputy Whitten now scheduled to depart from Houston at or around 1 p. m. #hounews
This is the complete statement Chief @ArtAcevedo provided to @HoustonChron for this story: https://twitter.com/stjbs/status/1224531734500388865

At or about noon, HPD will join the Liberty County Sheriff's Office in escorting fallen Deputy Richard Whitten from Houston to a Cleveland funeral home. The expected route will be north on SH 288 to the Eastex Freeway. Motorists should expect short delays. #hounews #houtraffic
Ahora en cabina: @masacks habla sobre violencia en noviazgo adolescente y abusos verbal y psicologico. Escuche en #ComunidadyConfianza

UPDATE: In the follow-up scene investigation, our Major Assaults detectives say indications are the suspect’s gun discharged when he tossed it out the window of the stolen vehicle and it hit the ground, causing fragments to strike one of our patrol vehicles. #hounews

The officers who patrol that area work out of the Clear Lake Patrol Station which is why the tweet was worded that way. Thank you for your comment.
You are correct; that area is not Clear Lake. The officers who patrol that area work out of the Clear Lake Patrol Station which is why the tweet was written that way. Thank you for your comment!
HPD Assistant Chief @sd_victorian provides n update on the conclusion of a fatal pursuit at 600 Sunnyside. #hounews

HPD Commanders & investigators are headed to 600 Sunnyside where a fatal pursuit ended. The female driver struck a pole and was transported to the hospital where she was pronounced deceased. Further info will be provided at the scene. A PIO is also en route. #hounews
Suspect is in custody from Pasadena chase. #hounews CC8
HPD units & Fox assisting Pasadena PD in search of suspect who stole their PD unit, crashed & bailed near US 288-Holmes. #hounews #houtraffic CC8

Northeast and Eastside officers are at 2500 SSGT Macario Garcia on a report of a male in Buffalo Bayou. Male fell or jumped in the bayou and has not been seen. HFD and Dive Team are searching. 202

Revised: WANTED: Have you seen this suspect? He burglarized a clothing store at 2205 Washington Avenue on December 19, 2019, at about 5 a.m. If you have information on his identity, contact @CrimeStopHOU ==>713-222-TIPS or HPD Burglary & Theft at 713-308-0900. #hounews
Thanks for the shout out for Sergeant Egdorf! #RelationalPolicing #hounews

Our homicide investigators are headed to a fatal shooting at 9002 Sterlingshire near Tidwell. The shooting occurred about 9:45 am at an apartment complex. The male victim was transported from 6100 blk of Irvington & pronounced deceased at a hospital. Avoid the area. #hounews

Hurry! Today is the last day we will be collecting items for #puertoricoearthquake assistance. Stop by any HPD station (locations here ==>http://bit.ly/HPD_stations) or @HPOUTX Thanks @astros for coordinating this drive! #RelationalPolicing

Clear Lake officers are at 16400 El Camino Real on a shooting report. No victims or suspects located. While working the scene Pct. 8 Constables reported a male with a gunshot wound showed up at a hospital. Officers are working to see if incidents are connected. 202

Southeast CST officers just apprehended two suspects 2400 Lidstone. Suspects were in a vehicle taken in an aggravated robbery earlier today and led officers on a short pursuit. One suspect was tased. One suspect was wanted on a felony warrant. 202

HPD Chief @ArtAcevedo met with Lydell Grant and the Innocence Project this afternoon. The two were able to officially meet after Grant was released from prison following a wrongful murder conviction. They spoke about the criminal justice system and keeping hope and faith alive.

That's a wrap. The final runner has crossed the finish line and we have reopened the race course. We will see you all next year! #houstonmarathon #houmarathon

Where we can, HPD is opening the early stages of #houstonmarathon route. There are still a lot of runners looking to finish the full #houmarathon so it will be a few more hours before the entire route is cleared. Thank you for your patience.
Congrats to these elite runners. Still a lot of participants on the roads though. Please continue to exercise patience and caution as you move about Houston. #houstonmarathon #houmarathon
HPD is stationed all along the #houmarathon making sure the 27,000 registered runners and their thousands of supporters stay safe. Good luck everyone!
The @HoustonMarathon has officially kicked off! Good luck to all runners #hounews
Chief @ArtAcevedo keeps a watchful eye as runners warm up for the @HoustonMarathon Welcome runners and good luck today!!!!
#RelationalPolicing

Thank you to the @HoustonRockets for inviting our officers to be a part of their #MLKDay discussion. Panel members spoke of how MLK Jr’s legacy has inspired them & reminded everyone of his message to always treat others with respect & learn to serve others. #RelationalPolicing
#RelationalPolicing

Det. Carr: Use common sense & be vigilant. Do not open, simply delete unsolicited or unexpected emails. If you shop on a website with phones & items for much lower prices, they’re likely scams. Crooks are “phishing” large & small businesses as well as average citizens everyday. – at Us Internal Revenue Service

#NeverForget HPD is the only police force in Texas that has its own VFW. VFW Post #6010 was established in 1962 by HPD officers who had served in WWII and the Korean War. Today, HPD employees more than 1400 veterans in classified and civilian positions. #veteransday

This vehicle is a show car only used at events. It is not used in patrol. It is used to remind everyone to have a safe ride home.

UPDATE-1: An #AmberAlert has been issued for Maleah. Her stepfather stated he, Maleah and Maleah's 2-year-old brother were abducted by 3 males sometime Friday night (May 3) in north Houston. The stepfather and brother were dropped off in the Sugar Land area on Saturday night.

The license plates on the truck and the motive in Maleah's disappearance are unknown. It's believed the incident originated somewhere in north Houston. We are told Maleah has a pink bow in her hair & was wearing a light blue zip jacket, blue jeans and gray/white/pink sneakers.

UPDATE on our officers: one officer shot in the shoulder has been released. 2 officers in critical condition & 2 others are in good condition. None of them will be released from the hospital tonite. One of the officers sustained a knee injury & isn’t believed to have been shot.

There are no charges in this incident, nor are any expected at this time.We thank everyone for their continuing interest in this case and always encourage the public to call the police whenever they believe a crime may have been committed. 5/5

HPD has thoroughly investigated this case and evidence obtained shows the incident, as described, did not occur. We met with the family and community leaders and showed them why we believe this to be the case. 2/5

Correction: the "record low" was in reference to use of force complaints in 2015 which was 96.
Correction - Robberies and aggravated assaults make up 95% of daily violent crime. Rapes & murders make up 5% of daily violent crime.
Chief McClelland: One DWI is too many. There is no excuse. If you decide to drive drunk or impaired, HPD will find you.
In the 2015 holiday season, 237 people were arrested for DWI, compared to 197 in 2014. 15 people lost their lives this holiday season.
Chief McClelland: DWI numbers remain high. This is one category of crime that persists but is inexcusable.
HPD had 96 use-of-force complaints. This is a record low number and I want to commend my officers for upholding our values.
Chief McClelland: This shows that police/community relations are working. We have made it easier to file complaints and it remains low.
HPD also has a record low number of internal affairs complaints. 209 complaints were filed by citizens in 2015 versus 207 in 2014.
The department is using technology to not only put us on the cutting edge of policing but to increase transparency and citizen knowledge.
Citizens can also request daily crime alerts to be emailed to them and can report tips to Crime Stoppers from the mapping feature.
HPD has a new crime mapping data function on the website that is updated every 30 minutes. This function went live on our website today.
Nonviolent crimes are also down. Home burglaries are down 17%. Burglaries of motor vehicles also decreased 2%.
Violent crimes are the department's highest priority. Robberies, which comprise 95% daily crime is flat. Enforcement, education are key.
Part 1 violent crimes did show a 25% increase in murder and a 20% increase in rapes. Robberies were flat and assaults were down.
Chief McClelland's monthly media availability is about to begin. Stay tuned for updates regarding the Houston Police Department.
